# LITERATURE REVIEW {#litrev}

Section and subsection headers can be introduced as such:

## Some section name {#section-tag-to-refer}

\lipsum[1]

## Some other section name

\lipsum[2]

A footnote can be includd here^[As such.].

### Some subsection name {#some-tag-for-subsection}

\lipsum[3]

### Some other subsection name

\lipsum[4]
